name: The Environment 2
description:
hello people we are back with a game.

In this game, you have to understand about PEACE. Humanity had died, it was the end of the world. but you were the chosen one. you have to go back in time to save humanity from dying. and this time its not about pollution, its about war.

(This is the sequel to "THE ENVIRONMENT")

Have fun :D

also if browser laggy then pls download.

feedbacks and suggestions are welcome !

(yes, polishing is needed, will work on that, this was made in 2 days.)
